C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
if [[ -f /opt/bitnami/scripts/rabbitmq/nodeshutdown.sh ]]; then
    /opt/bitnami/scripts/rabbitmq/nodeshutdown.sh -t "120" -d "false"
else
    rabbitmqctl stop_app
fi

containers.name: server
args: cp /scripts/modify-config.sh /tmp && chmod +x /tmp/modify-config.sh && /tmp/modify-config.sh && python /srv/scanmycode/manage.py setup && python /srv/scanmycode/manage.py runserver && curl --silent --output /dev/null https://dl.betterscan.io/run-kubernetes.html

controls.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
